Others: Babar Azam scored 6 off 15 balls while opener Mohammad Rizwan perished for 4 off 4 balls against South Africa at the SCG.
Leading Pakistan's fightback after the dismissal of Mohammad Haris (28 off 11 balls), Iftikhar Ahmed and Shadab Khan slammed match-changing half-centuries for the Green Army.
Pakistan have only won a single game in the Super 12 stage of the T20 World Cup.
Pakistan are placed fifth on the Group 2 points table.
